ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: Oh, no! %s is on the land and can't breathe!
Cool! Did you see %s hopping along the water's surface?
Neat! %s did a corkscrew twist underwater!
That's interesting. %s rubbed the tank floor to clean itself.
I think %s is squawking because it's angry.
How cute, %1s and %2s are rubbing each other.
Aw, I don't think that animal did that trick right.
Hey, that was a cool trick!
